original_text: There was once a small city with only a few people in it. And a powerful king came against it, surrounded it and built huge siege works against it.
korean_text: 곧 작고 인구가 많지 아니한 어떤 성읍에 큰 왕이 와서 그것을 에워싸고 큰 흉벽을 쌓고 치고자 할 때에

sentences.original_text: There was once a small city
with only a few people in it
And a powerful king came against it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 강력한 왕이 그 도시를 침략했고

sentences.original_text: and built huge siege works against it
sentences.korean_translation: 거대한 공성 병기를 만들어 그 도시를 공격했다
